On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Eddy

 4th ave & 12th st.

⏲ 1:04 p.m. on Wednesday, March 11

What are you doing today?

I’m up early in the morning, 9 o’clock. I study from 9 o’clock to 1 o’clock. I study Jewish studies. Then I come to the Square and buy some books. Later I’m going to meet my friend to study.

What's your favorite part of the day?

When I finish studying. I know that I’ve accomplished what I set out to do.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Tomorrow I’m going to study until 1 o’clock, since I’m retired. Then I’ll meet with my daughter for lunch.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
